TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfilePropertySettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfilePropertySettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 區段。

span.span: The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可用來以程式設計方式建立、 存取和修改個別的屬性新增至定義`properties`的子區段`profile`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. `profile`組態檔的區段會指定使用者設定檔的結構描述。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊`profile`一節，以產生類別名`ProfileCommon`，其係衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性`properties`的子區段`profile`組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 對於每個使用者設定檔中，建立這個類別的執行個體，您可以透過程式碼中存取個別的設定檔值屬性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 如需有關設定檔屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 設定檔功能的詳細資訊加入至[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性值，其中包含的集合物件。The following code example shows how to access the property value, which contains a collection of objects. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊`profile`一節，組態檔，以產生類別名`ProfileCommon`，其係衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 類別可讓您存取和修改個別使用者設定檔的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性`properties`的子區段`profile`組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 您指定當您建立的執行個體的參數值類別會用來定義相關聯的屬性，在`ProfileCommon`類別。The parameter values that you specify when you create an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 如需有關設定檔屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d).

value.span: 如果 類別中的相關聯屬性可由匿名使用者進行設定，則為 ，否則為 ，表示匿名使用者無法變更屬性值。

span.span: if the associated property in the class can be set by anonymous users; otherwise, , indicating that anonymous users cannot change the property value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊`profile`一節，組態檔，以產生類別名`ProfileCommon`，其係衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 類別可讓您存取和修改個別使用者設定檔的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性`properties`的子區段`profile`組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 您指定的執行個體的屬性值類別會用來定義相關聯的屬性，在`ProfileCommon`類別。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 如果中的屬性，會擲回例外狀況`ProfileCommon`由匿名使用者變更類別時屬性值是`false`。An exception is thrown if a property in the `ProfileCommon` class is changed by an anonymous user when the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊`profile`一節，組態檔，以產生類別名`ProfileCommon`，其係衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 類別可讓您存取和修改個別使用者設定檔的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性`properties`的子區段`profile`組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 您指定的執行個體的屬性值類別會用來定義相關聯的屬性，在`ProfileCommon`類別。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 初始值為使用預設值相關聯之`ProfileCommon`類別屬性，個別使用者設定檔不包含屬性的值時。The default value is used as the initial value for the associated `ProfileCommon` class property when an individual user profile does not contain a value for the property. 屬性可能是以字串值的 XML 編碼的值 （屬性的序列化模式是 XML 序列化） 或 base-64 編碼二進位字串 （如果屬性的序列化模式是二進位序列化）。The property may be a string value, an XML-encoded value (serialization mode for the property is XML serialization) or a base-64-encoded binary string (if the serialization mode for the property is binary serialization). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定提供者名稱，用於在序列化具名屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a provider to use when serializing the named property.

value.span: 屬性的提供者名稱，或空字串 ("")。

span.span: The name of a provider from the property, or an empty string ("").
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定檔提供者為使用者設定檔值會儲存在其中的資料來源。Profile providers are data sources in which user-profile values are stored. 您可以指定設定檔中的提供者`providers`子區段`profile`組態檔區段。You can specify profile providers in the `providers` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. 如果這個屬性的值為空字串，在中指定的預設提供者屬性使用。If the value of this property is an empty string, the default provider specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定動態產生之 類別中相關聯屬性的型別名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type of the associated property in the dynamically generated class.

value.span: 有效的完整型別參考，或空字串 ("")。

span.span: A valid, fully qualified type reference, or an empty string ("").
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為有效型別參考，這個型別用於所產生的具名屬性`ProfileCommon`類別。When set to a valid type reference, this type is used for the named property in the generated `ProfileCommon` class. 型別參考的格式，如下所示 （在方括號中的項目並非必要）： `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]`The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]` 例如: For example: `"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#18)]
